mapper.select:
SELECT /*+ INDEX(T2 PK_PDBS_PD_BAS) */ T2.SAP_MAT_CD /* SAP코드 */ , T1.PD_CD /* 품목코드 */ , T2.PD_NM /* 품목명 */ , T1.V_CNT01_W /* 1월 소요 A09 */ , T1.V_CNT01_F /* 1월 소요 A12 */ , T1.P_CNT01_W /* 1월 배정 A09 */ , T1.P_CNT01_F /* 1월 배정 A12 */ , T1.V_CNT02_W /* 2월 소요 A09 */ , T1.V_CNT02_F /* 2월 소요 A12 */ , T1.P_CNT02_W /* 2월 배정 A09 */ , T1.P_CNT02_F /* 2월 배정 A12 */ , T1.V_CNT03_W /* 3월 소요 A09 */ , T1.V_CNT03_F /* 3월 소요 A12 */ , T1.P_CNT03_W /* 3월 배정 A09 */ , T1.P_CNT03_F /* 3월 배정 A12 */ , T1.V_CNT04_W /* 4월 소요 A09 */ , T1.V_CNT04_F /* 4월 소요 A12 */ , T1.P_CNT04_W /* 4월 배정 A09 */ , T1.P_CNT04_F /* 4월 배정 A12 */ , T1.V_CNT05_W /* 5월 소요 A09 */ , T1.V_CNT05_F /* 5월 소요 A12 */ , T1.P_CNT05_W /* 5월 배정 A09 */ , T1.P_CNT05_F /* 5월 배정 A12 */ , T1.V_CNT06_W /* 6월 소요 A09 */ , T1.V_CNT06_F /* 6월 소요 A12 */ , T1.P_CNT06_W /* 6월 배정 A09 */ , T1.P_CNT06_F /* 6월 배정 A12 */ , T1.V_CNT07_W /* 7월 소요 A09 */ , T1.V_CNT07_F /* 7월 소요 A12 */ , T1.P_CNT07_W /* 7월 배정 A09 */ , T1.P_CNT07_F /* 7월 배정 A12 */ , T1.V_CNT08_W /* 8월 소요 A09 */ , T1.V_CNT08_F /* 8월 소요 A12 */ , T1.P_CNT08_W /* 8월 배정 A09 */ , T1.P_CNT08_F /* 8월 배정 A12 */ , T1.V_CNT09_W /* 9월 소요 A09 */ , T1.V_CNT09_F /* 9월 소요 A12 */ , T1.P_CNT09_W /* 9월 배정 A09 */ , T1.P_CNT09_F /* 9월 배정 A12 */ , T1.V_CNT10_W /* 10월 소요 A09 */ , T1.V_CNT10_F /* 10월 소요 A12 */ , T1.P_CNT10_W /* 10월 배정 A09 */ , T1.P_CNT10_F /* 10월 배정 A12 */ , T1.V_CNT11_W /* 11월 소요 A09 */ , T1.V_CNT11_F /* 11월 소요 A12 */ , T1.P_CNT11_W /* 11월 배정 A09 */ , T1.P_CNT11_F /* 11월 배정 A12 */ , T1.V_CNT12_W /* 12월 소요 A09 */ , T1.V_CNT12_F /* 12월 소요 A12 */ , T1.P_CNT12_W /* 12월 배정 A09 */ , T1.P_CNT12_F /* 12월 배정 A12 */ , T1.V_CNT01_W + T1.V_CNT02_W + T1.V_CNT03_W + T1.V_CNT04_W + T1.V_CNT05_W + T1.V_CNT06_W + T1.V_CNT07_W + T1.V_CNT08_W + T1.V_CNT09_W + T1.V_CNT10_W + T1.V_CNT11_W + T1.V_CNT12_W AS V_CNT99_W /* 계 소요 A09 */ , T1.V_CNT01_F + T1.V_CNT02_F + T1.V_CNT03_F + T1.V_CNT04_F + T1.V_CNT05_F + T1.V_CNT06_F + T1.V_CNT07_F + T1.V_CNT08_F + T1.V_CNT09_F + T1.V_CNT10_F + T1.V_CNT11_F + T1.V_CNT12_F AS V_CNT99_F /* 계 소요 A12 */ , T1.P_CNT01_W + T1.P_CNT02_W + T1.P_CNT03_W + T1.P_CNT04_W + T1.P_CNT05_W + T1.P_CNT06_W + T1.P_CNT07_W + T1.P_CNT08_W + T1.P_CNT09_W + T1.P_CNT10_W + T1.P_CNT11_W + T1.P_CNT12_W AS P_CNT99_W /* 계 배정 A09 */ , T1.P_CNT01_F + T1.P_CNT02_F + T1.P_CNT03_F + T1.P_CNT04_F + T1.P_CNT05_F + T1.P_CNT06_F + T1.P_CNT07_F + T1.P_CNT08_F + T1.P_CNT09_F + T1.P_CNT10_F + T1.P_CNT11_F + T1.P_CNT12_F AS P_CNT99_F /* 계 배정 A12 */ FROM ( SELECT S1.PD_CD , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '1' AND S1.VST_YM = '01' AND S1.ICDE = 'W' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS V_CNT01_W , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '1' AND S1.VST_YM = '01' AND S1.ICDE = 'F' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS V_CNT01_F , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '2' AND S1.VST_YM = '01' AND S1.ICDE = 'W' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS P_CNT01_W , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '2' AND S1.VST_YM = '01' AND S1.ICDE = 'F' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS P_CNT01_F , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '1' AND S1.VST_YM = '02' AND S1.ICDE = 'W' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS V_CNT02_W , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '1' AND S1.VST_YM = '02' AND S1.ICDE = 'F' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS V_CNT02_F , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '2' AND S1.VST_YM = '02' AND S1.ICDE = 'W' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS P_CNT02_W , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '2' AND S1.VST_YM = '02' AND S1.ICDE = 'F' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS P_CNT02_F , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '1' AND S1.VST_YM = '03' AND S1.ICDE = 'W' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS V_CNT03_W , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '1' AND S1.VST_YM = '03' AND S1.ICDE = 'F' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS V_CNT03_F , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '2' AND S1.VST_YM = '03' AND S1.ICDE = 'W' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS P_CNT03_W , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '2' AND S1.VST_YM = '03' AND S1.ICDE = 'F' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS P_CNT03_F , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '1' AND S1.VST_YM = '04' AND S1.ICDE = 'W' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS V_CNT04_W , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '1' AND S1.VST_YM = '04' AND S1.ICDE = 'F' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS V_CNT04_F , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '2' AND S1.VST_YM = '04' AND S1.ICDE = 'W' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS P_CNT04_W , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '2' AND S1.VST_YM = '04' AND S1.ICDE = 'F' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS P_CNT04_F , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '1' AND S1.VST_YM = '05' AND S1.ICDE = 'W' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS V_CNT05_W , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '1' AND S1.VST_YM = '05' AND S1.ICDE = 'F' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS V_CNT05_F , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '2' AND S1.VST_YM = '05' AND S1.ICDE = 'W' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS P_CNT05_W , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '2' AND S1.VST_YM = '05' AND S1.ICDE = 'F' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS P_CNT05_F , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '1' AND S1.VST_YM = '06' AND S1.ICDE = 'W' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS V_CNT06_W , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '1' AND S1.VST_YM = '06' AND S1.ICDE = 'F' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS V_CNT06_F , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '2' AND S1.VST_YM = '06' AND S1.ICDE = 'W' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS P_CNT06_W , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '2' AND S1.VST_YM = '06' AND S1.ICDE = 'F' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS P_CNT06_F , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '1' AND S1.VST_YM = '07' AND S1.ICDE = 'W' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS V_CNT07_W , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '1' AND S1.VST_YM = '07' AND S1.ICDE = 'F' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS V_CNT07_F , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '2' AND S1.VST_YM = '07' AND S1.ICDE = 'W' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS P_CNT07_W , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '2' AND S1.VST_YM = '07' AND S1.ICDE = 'F' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS P_CNT07_F , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '1' AND S1.VST_YM = '08' AND S1.ICDE = 'W' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS V_CNT08_W , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '1' AND S1.VST_YM = '08' AND S1.ICDE = 'F' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS V_CNT08_F , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '2' AND S1.VST_YM = '08' AND S1.ICDE = 'W' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS P_CNT08_W , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '2' AND S1.VST_YM = '08' AND S1.ICDE = 'F' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS P_CNT08_F , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '1' AND S1.VST_YM = '09' AND S1.ICDE = 'W' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS V_CNT09_W , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '1' AND S1.VST_YM = '09' AND S1.ICDE = 'F' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS V_CNT09_F , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '2' AND S1.VST_YM = '09' AND S1.ICDE = 'W' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS P_CNT09_W , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '2' AND S1.VST_YM = '09' AND S1.ICDE = 'F' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS P_CNT09_F , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '1' AND S1.VST_YM = '10' AND S1.ICDE = 'W' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS V_CNT10_W , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '1' AND S1.VST_YM = '10' AND S1.ICDE = 'F' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS V_CNT10_F , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '2' AND S1.VST_YM = '10' AND S1.ICDE = 'W' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS P_CNT10_W , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '2' AND S1.VST_YM = '10' AND S1.ICDE = 'F' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS P_CNT10_F , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '1' AND S1.VST_YM = '11' AND S1.ICDE = 'W' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS V_CNT11_W , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '1' AND S1.VST_YM = '11' AND S1.ICDE = 'F' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS V_CNT11_F , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '2' AND S1.VST_YM = '11' AND S1.ICDE = 'W' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS P_CNT11_W , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '2' AND S1.VST_YM = '11' AND S1.ICDE = 'F' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS P_CNT11_F , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '1' AND S1.VST_YM = '12' AND S1.ICDE = 'W' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS V_CNT12_W , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '1' AND S1.VST_YM = '12' AND S1.ICDE = 'F' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS V_CNT12_F , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '2' AND S1.VST_YM = '12' AND S1.ICDE = 'W' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS P_CNT12_W , SUM(CASE WHEN S1.VST_GB = '2' AND S1.VST_YM = '12' AND S1.ICDE = 'F' THEN S1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS P_CNT12_F FROM (
SELECT SUBSTR(D1.VST_DUEDT, 5, 2) AS VST_YM , '1' AS VST_GB , CASE WHEN D2.BASE_PD_CD IN ('WP01120008', 'WP01110022') THEN 'F' ELSE 'W' END AS ICDE , D1.PART_PD_CD AS PD_CD , SUM(D1.PART_USE_QTY) AS QTY FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ D1 /* 고객서비스정기BS주기내역 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL D2 /* 계약상세 */ ON D2.CNTR_NO = D1.CNTR_NO AND D2.CNTR_SN = D1.CNTR_SN AND D2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE D1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D1.PART_PD_CD IN ('WM07100488', 'WM07100489', 'WM07100490') AND D1.VST_DUEDT BETWEEN #{strtDt} AND #{endDt} GROUP BY SUBSTR(D1.VST_DUEDT, 5, 2), D1.PART_PD_CD , CASE WHEN D2.BASE_PD_CD IN ('WP01120008', 'WP01110022') THEN 'F' ELSE 'W' END UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(D1.ASN_OJ_YM, 5, 2) AS VST_YM , '2' AS VST_GB , CASE WHEN D2.BASE_PD_CD IN ('WP01120008', 'WP01110022') THEN 'F' ELSE 'W' END AS ICDE , D1.PU_PART_PD_CD AS PD_CD , SUM(D1.PU_QTY) AS QTY FROM TB_SVPD_RGBS_PU_ITM_IZ D1 /* 정기BS투입품목내역 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL D2 /* 계약상세 */ ON D2.CNTR_NO = D1.CNTR_NO AND D2.CNTR_SN = D1.CNTR_SN AND D2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE D1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D1.PU_PART_PD_CD IN ('WM07100488', 'WM07100489', 'WM07100490') AND D1.ASN_OJ_YM BETWEEN SUBSTR(#{strtDt}, 1, 6) AND SUBSTR(#{endDt}, 1, 6) GROUP BY SUBSTR(D1.ASN_OJ_YM, 5, 2), D1.PU_PART_PD_CD , CASE WHEN D2.BASE_PD_CD IN ('WP01120008', 'WP01110022') THEN 'F' ELSE 'W' END
SELECT SUBSTR(D1.VST_DUEDT, 5, 2) AS VST_YM , '1' AS VST_GB , CASE WHEN D2.PDCT_PD_CD IN ('WM02100197', 'WM02100143') THEN 'W' WHEN D2.PDCT_PD_CD IN ('WM02100040', 'WM02100042', 'WM02100144') THEN 'F' END AS ICDE , D1.PART_PD_CD AS PD_CD , SUM(D1.PART_USE_QTY) AS QTY FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ D1 /* 고객서비스정기BS주기내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ D2 /* 고객서비스수행내역 */ ON D2.CNTR_NO = D1.CNTR_NO AND D2.CNTR_SN = D1.CNTR_SN WHERE D1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D1.PART_PD_CD IN ('WM07100486', 'WM07104625') AND D1.VST_DUEDT BETWEEN #{strtDt} AND #{endDt} GROUP BY SUBSTR(D1.VST_DUEDT, 5, 2), D1.PART_PD_CD , CASE WHEN D2.PDCT_PD_CD IN ('WM02100197', 'WM02100143') THEN 'W' WHEN D2.PDCT_PD_CD IN ('WM02100040', 'WM02100042', 'WM02100144') THEN 'F' END UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ASN_OJ_YM, 5, 2) AS VST_YM , '2' AS VST_GB , CASE WHEN PDCT_PD_CD IN ('WM02100197', 'WM02100143') THEN 'W' WHEN PDCT_PD_CD IN ('WM02100040', 'WM02100042', 'WM02100144') THEN 'F' END AS ICDE , PU_PART_PD_CD AS PD_CD , SUM(PU_QTY) AS QTY FROM TB_SVPD_RGBS_PU_ITM_IZ /* 정기BS투입품목내역 */ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND PU_PART_PD_CD IN ('WM07100486', 'WM07104625') AND ASN_OJ_YM BETWEEN SUBSTR(#{strtDt}, 1, 6) AND SUBSTR(#{endDt}, 1, 6) GROUP BY SUBSTR(ASN_OJ_YM, 5, 2), PU_PART_PD_CD , CASE WHEN PDCT_PD_CD IN ('WM02100197', 'WM02100143') THEN 'W' WHEN PDCT_PD_CD IN ('WM02100040', 'WM02100042', 'WM02100144') THEN 'F' END
) S1 GROUP BY S1.PD_CD ) T1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T2 /* 상품기본 */ ON T2.PD_CD = T1.PD_CD WHERE T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T2.PD_TP_CD = 'M' ORDER BY T1.PD_CD
